scripts.name: Torn Bazaar Price Updater
scripts.description: Auto-fills Torn bazaar prices at (Market Value ± discount%). Positive % = MV - %, negative % = MV + %. Panel above #bazaarRoot with heading, Update All (Alt=Deep Scan), status badge, and a gear (bottom-right) for Settings. Customizable colors. Ignores "Remove" field on manage page. Strong detection & value writing, MV scrape fallback, diagnostics, and smooth auto-scroll pre-scan to capture lazy-loaded rows. Ignores inputs inside its own UI so settings never get overwritten. Works with TornTools.
